titleStmt.title: Some observations made upon the maldiva nut shewing its admirable virtue in giving an easie, safe, and speedy delivery to women in child-bed / written by a physitian in the countrey to Dr. Hinton at London, 1663.
titleStmt.author: Physitian in the countrey.
Peachi, John, fl. 1683.
Pechey, John, 1655-1716.

notesStmt.note: Attributed (probably erroneously) by Wing to John Peachi, since he was not admitted an extra-licentiate of the College of Physicians until 1683. Also attributed to John Pechey--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
